replies.msg:
The graph demonstrates the change of the amount of goods transported in the UK
from 1974 to 2002 by four different modes of transport.
It's clear that among of four different types of transport, road was the highest for the whole times of the 28 years. Meanwhile, pipeline was the least of the entire times.
Between 1974 to 1988, road was slightly growth from approximately 70 million tonnes(mt) to 75 mt. During the same period, water and pipeline was escalate from nearly 40 mt and 5 mt to 59 mt and 25 mt respectively. Seems like every modes of transport was raise while rail was drop from 40 mt to 30 mt.
Between 1988 to 2002, road was remained increase to almost 100 mt. At the same period, water and rail was inch upward to 65 mt and 40 mt respectively. By contrast, pipeline was the only one decrease on this period, it was lessened to 20 mt.
你應該要做功課 學好preposition先再寫文 見到小學雞錯誤都唔需要再睇落去 你都無俾effort

見你用咗兩次between..to
但好似between..and先岩 多人用
利申英文唔叻

呢次係我第一次計時咁做
原來都有啲壓力
見到自己犯埋晒啲低b錯誤
真係呢
保證下次應該唔會再錯

From ...to...
你自己寫完 睇一次先交卷
這個是最好的方法去攞高分！

可唔可以具體小小
除左grammar之外有咩地方要改善?
虛心求教
grammar比較多錯，重睇應該會見到
最盡得6....無overall statement. insufficient connective device,  sentence variation, synonyms

The graph demonstrates the change of the amount of goods transported in the UK
from 1974 to 2002 by four different modes of transport.
It's clear that among of four different types of transport, road was the highest for the whole times of the 28 years. Meanwhile, pipeline was the least of the entire times.
Between 1974 to 1988, road was slightly growth from approximately 70 million tonnes(mt) to 75 mt. During the same period, water and pipeline was escalate from nearly 40 mt and 5 mt to 59 mt and 25 mt respectively. Seems like every modes of transport was raise while rail was drop from 40 mt to 30 mt.
Between 1988 to 2002, road was remained increase to almost 100 mt. At the same period, water and rail was inch upward to 65 mt and 40 mt respectively. By contrast, pipeline was the only one decrease on this period, it was lessened to 20 mt.

quote.msg:
The graph demonstrates the change of the amount of goods transported in the UK
from 1974 to 2002 by four different modes of transport.
It's clear that among of four different types of transport, road was the highest for the whole times of the 28 years. Meanwhile, pipeline was the least of the entire times.
Between 1974 to 1988, road was slightly growth from approximately 70 million tonnes(mt) to 75 mt. During the same period, water and pipeline was escalate from nearly 40 mt and 5 mt to 59 mt and 25 mt respectively. Seems like every modes of transport was raise while rail was drop from 40 mt to 30 mt.
Between 1988 to 2002, road was remained increase to almost 100 mt. At the same period, water and rail was inch upward to 65 mt and 40 mt respectively. By contrast, pipeline was the only one decrease on this period, it was lessened to 20 mt.

replies.msg:
勇氣可嘉！
但文法真係弱，詞彙欠多元，句式基本無變化。
road was... pipeline was the ... 句子似中文直譯，而且文法錯唔少。

勇氣 : 9/9
Writing : 5/9, IELTS 不嬲俾Writing分都好手緊，唔錯grammar都係得6-6.5.

繼續努力

quote.msg:
可唔可以具體小小
除左grammar之外有咩地方要改善?
虛心求教

replies.msg:
你首先諗吓個四條線有邊啲可以一併描述，有邊啲要單獨描述。

好似陸路運輸，數字一直增長，除了xx至yy年其間輕微下跌，之後zz年持平。
微升、微跌、急升、急跌、持平、波動、重挫都唔少詞彙，英文同義詞都唔少，自己發掘吓。

「陸路運輸」唔係次次開句都road...
譬如可以試吓：Transportation of goods by road has been the most common in the UK with an upward trend in general since 1974, with the exception of a slight decline from 1978 to 1982, followed by a tie between 1990 and 1994.

Transportation of goods by road/trucks...
Road uses for transporting goods...
Truck as the most common mode of goods transportation...

It's clear that among of four different types of transport, road was the highest (highest咩?) for the whole times (throughout the entire period) of the 28 years. Meanwhile, pipeline was the least (least咩?) of the entire times. (time眾數指次數，雖然time單數都啱，period先啱)

Between 1974 to 1988 (between...and, 一係from...to....), road was slightly growth (growth係noun) from approximately 70 million tonnes(mt) to 75 mt (tonnes唔係描述緊road，睇吓題目). During the same period, water and pipeline was escalate (點解會係passive? escalate係verb) from nearly 40 mt and 5 mt to 59 mt and 25 mt respectively (tonnes唔係描述緊water, pipeline，睇吓題目). Seems like (seems like好colloquial, not formal English) every modes of transport (every is followed by singular noun form)was raise (raise is a verb, and why passive?) while rail was drop from 40 mt to 30 mt. (ditto)

之後錯嘅野都差唔多, 比都盡5啦
